com.facebook.buck.model

Class FilesystemBackedBuildFileTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.model.BuildFileTree
      • com.facebook.buck.model.FilesystemBackedBuildFileTree

  • public class FilesystemBackedBuildFileTree
extends BuildFileTree
    Class to allow looking up parents and children of build files. E.g. for a directory structure that looks like: 
       foo/BUCK
   foo/bar/baz/BUCK
   foo/bar/qux/BUCK

    foo/BUCK is the parent of foo/bar/baz/BUCK and foo/bar/qux/BUCK.

      • getChildPaths

        public Collection<Path> getChildPaths(BuildTarget target)
        Specified by:
        getChildPaths in class BuildFileTree
        Returns:
        paths relative to BuildTarget that contain their own build files.

      • getBasePathOfAncestorTarget

        public Path getBasePathOfAncestorTarget(Path filePath)
        Returns the base path for a given path. The base path is the nearest directory at or above filePath that contains a build file. If no base directory is found, returns an empty path.
        Specified by:
        getBasePathOfAncestorTarget in class BuildFileTree
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path whose base path to find.
        Returns:
        the base path, or null if no base path is found.
